title: Would love to know what font this is
content:
The blue font is awesome and I need to know what it is.

[http://l3.yimg.com/bt/api/res/1.2/xr7Yiu\_npuAPL.Wt6wTdLQ--/YXBwaWQ9eW5ld...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825180410/http:/l3.yimg.com/bt/api/res/1.2/xr7Yiu_npuAPL.Wt6wTdLQ--/YXBwaWQ9eW5ld3M7Y2g9MTQxMjtjcj0xO2N3PTIxMjY7ZHg9MDtkeT0wO2ZpPXVsY3JvcDtoPTQxOTtxPTg1O3c9NjMw/http:/l.yimg.com/os/publish-images/finance/2013-01-22/fc21c975-28bf-4fb6-840e-b41f9485f05e_156276530.jpg "http://l3.yimg.com/bt/api/res/1.2/xr7Yiu\_npuAPL.Wt6wTdLQ--/YXBwaWQ9eW5ld3M7Y2g9MTQxMjtjcj0xO2N3PTIxMjY7ZHg9MDtkeT0wO2ZpPXVsY3JvcDtoPTQxOTtxPTg1O3c9NjMw/http://l.yimg.com/os/publish-images/finance/2013-01-22/fc21c975-28bf-4fb6-840e-b41f9485f05e\_156276530.jpg")

author: CyBerCyclone
